data.title: Kristine Hermosa Biography
data.meta_description: Read all about Kristine Hermosa with TV Guide's exclusive biography including their list of awards, celeb facts and more at TV Guide.
data.text:
Fast Facts

Was selected to be a part of the Star Circle Batch 4 at the age of 12

Made her debut on television in the show Ang TV in 1996

Was nominated for the FAMAS Best Actress Award for her role in All My Life (2004)

Won the Anak TV Seal Most Admired Female TV Personality Award in 2006

Also won the Box-Office Queen of Philippine Movies title in 2006 at the 37th Guillermo Mendoza Scholarship Foundation Memorial Awards

Made it to the For Him Magazine (FHM) Philippines' Hall of Fame Hot 100 list in 2010, as she had been on the FHM 100 Sexiest list for 10 years

Won a New York Festivals Award in 2011 for the television show Dahil May Isang Ikaw, which first aired in 2009
